relation: But he deals some mighty damage. :(

Unassuming Local Guy. I re-worked him a bit, especially his head, from an earlier version I'd done. I liked the other one as well, especially how the face fooled, but I decided the one you see here looked more like the game sprite. The alternate version can be seen by following this link: http://starmen.net/forum/?t=getfile&id=30211
Another insane cultist of the Happy-Happy, ready to apply a coat of blue.
Fearsome leader of the Happy Happiests.
